custom-action.name: imported_idoc_inbound
custom-action.description:
Sends an inbound IDoc based on an IDoc payload template or received outbound IDocs.
Parameters: - destination: Name of the destination to use. - templateFile: Absolute path to the IDoc XML file to send. - parseXML: Whether to scan the template for NeoLoad variables. Possible values: true/false. - respondingToOutbound: Whether to respond to an IDoc received by the listener. Possible values: true/false. - idocType: Type of IDocs to respond to. Used only when respondingToOutbound=true.
